SELECT mat.accessSys as accessMostSys, mat.access as accessMost, mit.accessSys as accessLeastSys, mit.access as accessLeast FROM ( SELECT accessSys,access FROM( SELECT cm.m_name as accessSys, sum(in_flows+out_flows) as access FROM data_monitor_traffic_m tm LEFT JOIN cfg_monitor cm ON tm.m_id = cm.m_id WHERE
DATEDIFF(tm.col_time,NOW())=-1
YEARWEEK(tm.col_time) = YEARWEEK(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK))
YEAR(tm.col_time) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(tm.col_time) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
group by cm.m_name ORDER BY sum(in_flows+out_flows) DESC )t WHERE t.accessSys IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1 )mat, ( SELECT accessSys,access FROM( SELECT cm.m_name as accessSys, sum(in_flows+out_flows) as access FROM data_monitor_traffic_m tm LEFT JOIN cfg_monitor cm ON tm.m_id = cm.m_id WHERE
DATEDIFF(tm.col_time,NOW())=-1
YEARWEEK(tm.col_time) = YEARWEEK(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK))
YEAR(tm.col_time) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(tm.col_time) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
group by cm.m_name ORDER BY sum(in_flows+out_flows) ASC )t WHERE t.accessSys IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1 )mit

SELECT datangjituanbenbu.critical + datangfengongsi.critical as infoSysAlarmSerious, datangjituanbenbu.major + datangfengongsi.major as infoSysAlarmMain, datangjituanbenbu.minor +datangfengongsi.minor as infoSysAlarmMinor, datangjituanbenbu.warnning + datangfengongsi.warnning as infoSysAlarmCommon, datangjituanbenbu.sumnum + datangfengongsi.sumnum as infoSysAlarmTotal FROM ( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN fseverity='5'THEN num ELSE 0 END )as critical, SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity='4'THEN num ELSE 0 END )as major, SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity='3'THEN num ELSE 0 END )as minor, SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity='2'THEN num ELSE 0 END )as warnning, SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity='1'THEN num ELSE 0 END )as unkown, SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity IS NOT NULL THEN num ELSE 0 END ) as sumnum
FROM ( SELECT SUM(tp.num) AS num,tp.fip,tp.fcause,tp.fseverity FROM (
SELECT tf.num,CASE WHEN tf.fseverity=5 THEN "严重报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=4 THEN "主要报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=3 THEN "次要报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=2 THEN "警告报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=1 THEN "未知报警" END fip,tf.mosn,tf.fcause,tf.fseverity FROM ( SELECT sum(dd.num ) as num,dd.mosn,dd.fseverity,dd.fcause,dd.fshareid ,dd.fname FROM (
SELECT COUNT(bb.fshareid) AS num,aa.mosn,aa.fseverity,aa.fcause,bb.fshareid ,bb.fname FROM ( SELECT mosn,fSeverity,fcause,flasttime FROM tfactive )aa , (SELECT tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid,tcc.fname FROM tcmo tcc,tmdatangintegr tmm WHERE tcc.fstatus =99 AND tcc.fshareid = tmm.sn GROUP BY tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid UNION SELECT tm.mosn,tt.fshareid,tt.fname FROM tmct tm , (SELECT tc.ctid,t.mosn,t.fshareid,t.fname,t.ftitle FROM tcapct tc, (SELECT tcc.mosn ,tcc.fshareid,tcc.fname,tmm.ftitle FROM tcmo tcc,tmdatangintegr tmm WHERE tcc.fstatus =99 AND tcc.fshareid = tmm.sn GROUP BY tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid ) t WHERE t.mosn = tc.mosn )tt WHERE tm.fCtID = tt.ctid UNION
SELECT mo.mosn,t.fshareid,t.fname FROM tcmo mo, trrelation rel,(SELECT mosn,fname,fshareid FROM tcmo WHERE fstatus =99 )t WHERE (rel.fsrmosn = t.mosn OR rel.ftrmosn = t.mosn ) AND mo.fmotype LIKE "12%" AND ((mo.mosn = rel.fsrmosn OR mo.mosn = rel.ftrmosn) AND mo.mosn != t.mosn ) GROUP BY mosn )bb WHERE aa.mosn = bb.mosn GROUP BY bb.fshareid,aa.fseverity )dd group by dd.fseverity)tf)tp GROUP BY tp.fSeverity )allABT )datangjituanbenbu, ( select tttt.critical, tttt.major,tttt.minor,tttt.warnning,tttt.unkown,(tttt.critical+tttt.major+tttt.minor+tttt.warnning+tttt.unkown) as sumnum from ( SELECT Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fip='严重报警' THEN ttt.num else 0 END) critical,Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fip='主要' THEN ttt.num else 0 END) major, Max( CASE WHEN ttt.fip="次要" THEN ttt.num else 0 END )minor, Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fip="警告" THEN ttt.num else 0 END )warnning, Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fip="未知" THEN ttt.num else 0 END )unkown FROM ( SELECT SUM(tp.num) AS num,tp.fip,tp.fcause,tp.fseverity FROM (
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num,CASE WHEN tf.fseverity=5 THEN "严重报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=4 THEN "主要" WHEN tf.fseverity=3 THEN "次要" WHEN tf.fseverity=2 THEN "警告" WHEN tf.fseverity=1 THEN "未知" END fip,tf.mosn,tf.fcause,tf.fseverity FROM tfactive tf, ( SELECT mosn FROM tcmo WHERE fMOType LIKE 'ap%' AND tcmo.fstatus IS NULL UNION (SELECT tm.mosn FROM tmct tm ,(SELECT tc.ctid FROM tcapct tc,tcmo t WHERE t.fMOType LIKE 'ap%' AND t.fstatus IS NULL AND t.mosn = tc.MOSN)tt WHERE tm.fCtID = tt.ctid))th WHERE th.mosn = tf.mosn GROUP BY tf.fSeverity)tp GROUP BY tp.fSeverity )ttt)tttt )datangfengongsi

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN fseverity IS NOT NULL THEN num ELSE 0 END ) as alarmHeader FROM ( SELECT SUM(tp.num) AS num,tp.fip,tp.fcause,tp.fseverity FROM (
SELECT tf.num,CASE WHEN tf.fseverity=5 THEN "严重报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=4 THEN "主要报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=3 THEN "次要报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=2 THEN "警告报警" WHEN tf.fseverity=1 THEN "未知报警" END fip,tf.mosn,tf.fcause,tf.fseverity FROM ( SELECT sum(dd.num ) as num,dd.mosn,dd.fseverity,dd.fcause,dd.fshareid ,dd.fname FROM (
SELECT COUNT(bb.fshareid) AS num,aa.mosn,aa.fseverity,aa.fcause,bb.fshareid ,bb.fname FROM ( SELECT mosn,fSeverity,fcause,flasttime FROM tfactive )aa , (SELECT tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid,tcc.fname FROM tcmo tcc,tmdatangintegr tmm WHERE tcc.fstatus =99 AND tcc.fshareid = tmm.sn GROUP BY tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid UNION SELECT tm.mosn,tt.fshareid,tt.fname FROM tmct tm , (SELECT tc.ctid,t.mosn,t.fshareid,t.fname,t.ftitle FROM tcapct tc, (SELECT tcc.mosn ,tcc.fshareid,tcc.fname,tmm.ftitle FROM tcmo tcc,tmdatangintegr tmm WHERE tcc.fstatus =99 AND tcc.fshareid = tmm.sn GROUP BY tcc.mosn,tcc.fshareid ) t WHERE t.mosn = tc.mosn )tt WHERE tm.fCtID = tt.ctid UNION
SELECT mo.mosn,t.fshareid,t.fname FROM tcmo mo, trrelation rel,(SELECT mosn,fname,fshareid FROM tcmo WHERE fstatus =99 )t WHERE (rel.fsrmosn = t.mosn OR rel.ftrmosn = t.mosn ) AND mo.fmotype LIKE "12%" AND ((mo.mosn = rel.fsrmosn OR mo.mosn = rel.ftrmosn) AND mo.mosn != t.mosn ) GROUP BY mosn )bb WHERE aa.mosn = bb.mosn GROUP BY bb.fshareid,aa.fseverity )dd group by dd.fseverity)tf)tp GROUP BY tp.fSeverity )allABT

select tttt.major as alarmNetworkUnreach,tttt.minor as alarmURL,tttt.warnning as alarmHeaderOther from ( SELECT Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fcause='网络不通' THEN ttt.num else 0 END) major, Max( CASE WHEN ttt.fcause='URL错误' THEN ttt.num else 0 END )minor, Max(CASE WHEN ttt.fcause='其它' THEN ttt.num else 0 END )warnning FROM ( select sum(tt.num) as num,tt.fcause from ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, CASE WHEN tf.fcause="设备不可达" THEN "网络不通" WHEN tf.fcause="拨测连接失败" THEN "网络不通" WHEN tf.fcause="拨测连接超时" THEN "网络不通" WHEN tf.fcause="拨测未知错误" THEN "网络不通" WHEN tf.fcause="URL应答码错误" THEN "URL错误" else '其它' END fcause FROM tfactive tf, ( SELECT mosn FROM tcmo WHERE fstatus =99 UNION (SELECT tm.mosn FROM tmct tm , (SELECT tc.ctid FROM tcapct tc,tcmo t WHERE t.fstatus =99 AND t.mosn = tc.MOSN)tt WHERE tm.fCtID = tt.ctid))th WHERE tf.fSeverity=5 AND th.mosn = tf.mosn GROUP BY fcause )tt group by tt.fcause)ttt )tttt
